snippet: Nationalbanken said on Thursday it had cut the interest rate on certificates of deposit by a further 0.25 percentage point to minus 0.75 percent.
abstract: Denmark's central bank Nationalbanken cuts interest rate on certificates of deposit by another 0.25 point to minus 0.75 percent; it is fourth cut in month.
lead_paragraph: Nationalbanken said on Thursday it had cut the interest rate on certificates of deposit by a further 0.25 percentage point to minus 0.75 percent.

headline.main: Denmark Cuts Interest Rates for Fourth Time in a Month
headline.print_headline: Denmark Cuts Interest Rates for Fourth Time in a Month
